title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Justice (Alteration of Name of
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Justice (Alteration of Name of 

Department and Title of Minister) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 5 June 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited justice (alteration name department title minister) order 2025 (2) order come operation 5 june 2025

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the Irish language, an Roinn Dlí agus Cirt and, in the English language, the 
Department of Justice, is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an Roinn Dlí 
agus Cirt, Gnóthaí Baile agus Imirce and, in the English language, to that of the 
Department of Justice, Home Affairs and Migration.
text_norm: 2 name department state present name irish language roinn dli agus cirt english language department justice altered irish language roinn dli agus cirt gnothai baile agus imirce english language department justice home affair migration

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose 
present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Dlí agus Cirt and, in the English 
language, the Minister for Justice, is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an 
tAire Dlí agus Cirt, Gnóthaí Baile agus Imirce and, in the English language, to 
that of the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration.
text_norm: 3 title minister charge department state whose present title irish language taire dli agus cirt english language minister justice altered irish language taire dli agus cirt gnothai baile agus imirce english language minister justice home affair migration

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment –
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment – 

(a) 

(b) 

references to the Department of Justice shall be construed as 
references to the Department of Justice, Home Affairs and 
Migration, and 

references to the Minister for Justice shall be construed as 
references to the Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and 
Migration. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 

4 June, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 10th June, 2025.
